about_the_game:
The awful zombie apocalypse has begun. Office worker Jack got stuck in Las Vegas right in the center of the richest casino on the planet...Fortunately.

He must protect the strange red button until other survivors try to find some help. If zombies get to the button - the real apocalypse will start.

Success factors:

  • Survive 45 zombie waves defending red button.
  • Test on yourself three types of zombies.


  • Pay attention to 4 sides of zombies coming at the same time.
  • Set barricades on zombies ways.


  • Buy weapons in 4 slot machines for coins.
  • Use various weapons against zombies: sword, bow, magic spells, and items like bombs, time slowing, and others.


  • Request fire support or humanitarian assistance from the air.
  • Take breaks to upgrade the character.

short_description: Meet a zombie apocalypse in the most not boring place on earth - Las Vegas? Why not! Zombie Vegas is an intense arcade action game with the strange red button and the hero protecting it. Buy weapons and bonuses, barricade ways and destroy the approaching zombie.
